lead_paragraph: The United States have famously been Olympic rugby champions since winning gold in the 15-man game in 1924 but one of a string southern hemisphere sides look set to strike that anomaly from the record books when Sevens makes its debut in Rio.

headline.print_headline: High Octane Sevens Brings Rugby Back to the Games
headline.main: High Octane Sevens Brings Rugby Back to the Games

snippet: The United States have famously been Olympic rugby champions since winning gold in the 15-man game in 1924 but one of a string southern hemisphere sides look set to strike that anomaly from the record books when Sevens makes its debut in Rio....
